name: Quarterstaff Master
text: You can wield a quarterstaff as either a two-handed or one-handed weapon.
benefit: By employing a number of different stances and techniques, you can wield a quarterstaff as a one-handed weapon. At the start of your turn, you decide whether or not you are going to wield the quarterstaff as a one-handed or two-handed weapon. When you wield it as a one-handed weapon, your other hand is free, and you cannot use the staff as a double weapon. You can take the feat Weapon Specialization in the quarterstaff even if you have no levels in fighter.
staminaText: When you use this feat to wield a quarterstaff as a one-handed weapon, you can spend 5 stamina points to retain the ability to use it as a double weapon and still keep a hand free. This effect lasts until the beginning of your next turn.
text_zh: 你能将木棍当作单手或双手武器使用。
benefit_zh: 靠着采取一些不同的姿势和战技，你可以将木棍作为单手武器。在你行动轮开始的时候，你可以决定要将木棍当作单手还是双手武器使用，当你把它作为单手武器，你的另外一只手就可以自由活动，不过如此一来就不能用木裈以双头武器的方式发起攻击。此外，拥有此专长之后，就算你不是战士，你仍可以选择木棍的“武器专精”。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用这个专长来以单手武器持用木棍时，你可以消耗5点耐力来获得以双头武器使用它的能力，并同时保持一只手空闲。这个效果持续到你的下一回合开始。
